description: Defines the identity and versioning of the Advanced Orientation and Research Protocol (AORP).

rules.description: The governing protocol set is identified as the Advanced Orientation and Research Protocol (AORP).
rules.enforcement: Protocol is identified by its name in documentation and compiled artifacts.

rules.description: The official protocol version is tracked in the VERSION file in the repository root, following Semantic Versioning (SemVer).
rules.enforcement: Build or validation scripts should verify the presence and format of the VERSION file.
